page.title: 16IRVINE * ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
There are lots of opportunities for out of school entertainment in our area.
There is a{cinema}and the{Magnum {Leisure Centre}shows films and stages shows in it's theatre. There are{Girl {Guide}companies,{Boy's Brigade, Anchor {Boys, Brownies, Owlets, badminton {classes,squash classes, dancing {classes,}and a{bowling club}in Dreghorn. The Magnum leisure centre houses swimming pools, a skating rink, a gymnasium, squash courts and indoor bowling.
Many people spend time watching {television.}Our favourite t.v. programmes are:_Grange Hill; Street Hawk; The A. Team; Fraggle Rock;The Young Ones; No. 73; Dynasty; Dallas; The Wide Awake Club.
